title: Account Banned but I got no information as to why I was banned.

replies.body: You should have gotten an email sent to the verified email on this account, but if not you're welcome to hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to get the full context!
Thank you! Im really confused on the reason why I was banned XD
